document.full_text: fourth seed david ferrer motored into the semi-finals of the monte carlo masters with a 6-3 6-3 win over serbia's viktor troicki friday.
document.title: ferrer speeds into monte carlo last four
lines_and_colors: fourth seed david ferrer motored into the semi-finals of the monte carlo masters with a 6-3 6-3 win over serbia's viktor troicki friday.
